description: About the crucial role television and film play in the running of a political campaign. Covers both the making of a candidate and the making of the film "The Candidate". Points out that in a campaign 'the general idea is to project energy, warmth, and decisiveness, without saying anything too specific'. Suitable for upper secondary level.
